label: Personalized Jewelry
description: Jewelry that can be customized with names, initials, fingerprints, and other personal details.

subcategories.label: Name Necklaces
subcategories.description: Necklaces with personalized names or initials.

subcategories.label: Engraved Jewelry
subcategories.description: Jewelry with personalized engravings, including fingerprints and handprints.

subcategories.label: Children's Jewelry
subcategories.description: Jewelry designed for children, including bracelets, necklaces, and earrings.

subcategories.label: Personalized Gifts
subcategories.description: Personalized gifts for various occasions, including birthdays, weddings, and anniversaries.

subcategories.label: Engraving Tools
subcategories.description: Tools for engraving jewelry and other items.
